varValueEnglish: You must wait for 10 minutes to resend OTP.

varValueEnglish: Are you sure you want to go back? Continue if you want to edit your Aadhaar number.

varValueEnglish: If you go back your Aadhaar Verification will have to be redone. Continue only if you want to edit your Aadhaar number.

varValueEnglish: I agree with the KYC registration Terms & Conditions to verifiy my identity. PAN is required to verify name and date of birth.
